entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:32 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains late this evening and overnight. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Blowing snow. Wind east 20 km/h except 50 gusting to 70 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Blowing snow. Low minus 28. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 25.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 25. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 29. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
